comment._content: possibly related to a story implicating him in the harsh treatment of prisoners in the NY state prison at Auburn. Also supervised autopsy of McKinley assassin after he was electrocuted. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9406E...
